basics.name: Joseph Kligel
basics.label: A full-stack developer and software developer with over 6 years of experience. Have created and currently developing many web applications using Python and Flask, MERN, Java Spring Boot, and more. Hobby: x86 Assembly
basics.summary: I love full-stack developing and am avid software engineer well-versed in GNU/Linux, Bash, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, MongoDB, SQL, Python, and C++/C. I have built many projects in these languages and they can be viewed on https://github.com/josephkligel in the repositories section. If you would like to view my knowledge in these programming fields, I have lists of my knowledge on https://github.com/josephkligel/Programmapedia.

work.name: Kirkland's
work.summary: I develop software for key WMS functionalities through the HJ1 system. This software includes interfacing with Oracle, creating universally stored procedures for daily workloads, adding features to the HJ1 system, and troubleshooting/fixing errors in WMS.

work.name: Kirkland's
work.summary:
Serve as the first point of contact for customers seeking technical assistance over the phone or email

Perform remote troubleshooting through diagnostic techniques and pertinent questions

Determine the best solution based on the issue and details provided by customers

Direct unresolved issues to the next level of support personnel

Provide accurate information on IT products or services

Record events and problems and their resolution in logs

Follow-up and update customer status and information

Identify and suggest possible improvements on procedures

Update, create, update, and delete product records with SQL Server

work.name: Coding Dojo
work.summary: Developer stacks: Web-Fundamentals, Python, MERN, and Java. Created and maintained software and web applications using back-end/front-end programming languages, APIs, frameworks, and database technologies, such as MySQL, MongoDB, Java Spring Boot, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Python, Flask, and more.

work.name: Alphatec Spine
work.summary:
Install and maintain low-dosage x-ray machines. Troubleshoot, maintain, and create applications for x-ray machine management and work procedures. 
Repaired high-value X-Ray machines to ensure the mechanical and software functions of the machines worked as expected.
Assembled troubleshooting guides and developed full-stack software to record machine data (such as part functionality, part consumption, part failures, issue resolutions) using Python, C/C++ and MySQL. The purpose of which was to establish a system for understanding the new EOS Edge X-Ray machine during its development and testing phases.
Maintained code bases, software, and firmware using programming languages like Python, PowerShell, and Bash to established communication and proper management of X-Ray machines and their components.
Installed frameworks and dependencies on machines for the purpose of making the programs and software work effectively.

work.name: Self Employed
work.summary:
Traded put and call options on RobinHood and made income that way.
Made income on the side, daily while also working at FedEx Tech Center

work.name: FedEx
work.summary:
Started through a temp job agency working at FedEx Tech and then got the job full-time working directly for FedEx Tech.
Program scanners and printers, fix them, and test them. Create applications to make repair workflows easier.
Maintained firmware and embedded programming using Assembly, C/C++, and proprietary languages like Zebraâ€™s Programming Language (ZPL) to fix various electronic devices.
Engineered computer and device scripts using Python, Node.js, C/C++, PowerShell, and Bash to automate tasks and provide proper feedback to changes made to devices, after their repair.
Developed websites and databases using JavaScript, HTML/CSS, and MySQL to keep track of repairs and part lists on devices.

work.name: Hipudding Education
work.summary: Assistance and maintenance with computer hardware and systems, install and updating software, upgrading operating systems, setting up virtual machines, configuring networks and password creation, repairing and fixing computers and other electronics

work.name: Blogger and Day Trader
work.summary: Wrote about stocks, companies and their fundamentals, value investing, mutual fund and ETF investing, day trading using retail trading platform and made market predictions. Traded, options, currency, stocks, and cryptocurrencies on margin. I turned $5,000 into roughly $21,000, over 420% profit in one year.

work.name: Lincoln College - Normal
work.summary: Security officer duties. Performed IT duties while a security officer, such as computer and operation support, desktop support, responding to incoming requests for IT issues, help in solving network issues, updating software, maintaining and backing up files and other resources.

work.name: Walmart
work.summary: Performed routine maintenance procedures and helped troubleshoot and quickly repair any mechanical or electrical problems.

work.name: Conway Services
work.summary: HVAC Sales Associate sells HVAC retail products, goods, and services. HVAC sales associates work with customers to find what they want, ensure a smooth sales process and process transactions.

work.name: US Navy
work.summary:
Assists medical officer in carrying out surgical techniques. Provides nursing care, safety and support to patients before, during and after surgery. Selects, sterilizes and prepares instruments and materials and the aseptic environment necessary for surgery. Assists anesthetist during operating procedures in giving artificial respiration and in the use of resuscitators. Maintains surgical equipment and records. Assists with instruction, supervision, and evaluation of students and other corpsmen assigned duties relating to surgery.
Assists medical officer in examination and treatment of urological patients. Operates and maintains urological equipment and appliances. Performs urological X ray procedures. Prepares supplies, instruments, dressings, and utensils for urological operations and treatments.

volunteer.summary: Lead community get-together, organized festival, performed maintenance on machines, planned and conducted recreational activities for participants, and kept order.
